## GaussianBlurBlitter.(constructor)

Creates an instance of GaussianBlurBlitter

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(phase: 'horizonal' | 'vertical', kernalSize: number, sigma: number, blurSize: number);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  phase | 'horizonal' \| 'vertical' | Blitter phase |
|  kernalSize | number | kernel size |
|  sigma | number | Gaussian standard deviation |
|  blurSize | number | Blur radius |
